data.actual_result: The log stays open after you choose a filter.
data.expected_result: The log that you expanded, should be closed after choosing a filter, like desktop.
data.short_description: Audit log expansion stays expanded when you switch filters.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log - Go to a expandable log, and expand it. - Go to "Filter by Action", and select the filter that corresponds to the one you expanded. - Observe the same log that you expanded.
